General.Name: Hunan Yussen Energy Technology
General.Description: Hunan Yussen Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the development and production of deep-processed organic chemical products in China. Its products include methyl tert-butyl ether, isooctane, isopropyl alcohol, and maleic anhydride. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Huizhou, China.
